created_datetime.name: created_datetime
created_datetime.comment: Date and time that this entity was created.

created_by.name: created_by
created_by.comment: User that created this entity. Refers to users.id

updated_datetime.name: updated_datetime
updated_datetime.comment: Date and time that this entity was last updated.

updated_by.name: updated_by
updated_by.comment: User that last updated any field on this entity. Refers to users.id.

dashboard_id.name: dashboard_id
dashboard_id.comment: Refers to the dashboard that the entity is currently on, OR NULL if not on a dashboard.

moved_to_dashboard_date.name: moved_to_dashboard_date
moved_to_dashboard_date.comment: Datetime that an entity was moved to the dashboard that it is currently on.

moved_to_dashboard_by.name: moved_to_dashboard_by
moved_to_dashboard_by.comment: User that moved the entity to the dashboard that it is currently on. Refers to users.id.

pid.name: pid
pid.comment: The patient that this data source entity is related to.

source.name: source
source.comment: The source of the entity, whether form, api or some other entry-point.
